system_prompt_lines: Analyze this audio and identify the musical genre.
Respond ONLY with valid JSON in this exact format:
- Secondary genre or subgenre if applicable
Analyze the audio and return 3 mood tags.
Respond ONLY with valid JSON in this exact format:
- Use only concise, single-word or short moods.
Identify the main instruments in this audio.
Respond ONLY with valid JSON in this exact format:
- Do NOT output genres, vocal styles or generic terms (e.g., 'rap', 'hip hop', 'vocals', 'beat').
Analyze the vocal characteristics in this audio.
Respond ONLY with valid JSON in this exact format:
{"vocal_type": "male vocal|female vocal|spoken word|male feature vocal|female feature vocal|instrumental"}
Choose exactly ONE from the list above. Use English terms only.

retry_templates.genre: IMPORTANT: Respond ONLY with JSON matching exactly {"genres": ["genre1", "genre2"]}. Provide 2 specific genres. English only. No explanations.
retry_templates.mood: IMPORTANT: Return exactly 3 distinct mood items as a JSON array under key "mood". Use concise, single- or two-word English moods. JSON only, no explanations.
retry_templates.instruments: IMPORTANT: Respond ONLY with JSON matching exactly {"instruments": ["inst1", "inst2", "inst3", "inst4"]}. Provide 3-4 real instruments (no genres/vocals). English only. No explanations.
retry_templates.vocal: IMPORTANT: Respond ONLY with JSON like {"vocal_type": "male vocal|female vocal|spoken word|male feature vocal|female feature vocal|instrumental"}. Choose exactly one. English only. No explanations.
retry_templates.default: IMPORTANT: Return at least {need} distinct {category} item(s) as per the JSON schema. JSON only, no explanations.
retry_templates.incremental: IMPORTANT: We already have: {existing}. Return ONLY {need} additional unique {category} item(s). Do not repeat any of the existing items. JSON only, no explanations.
